p: The slight difference between the spectrums of the sample after SCWE and the control sample provides some evidence of SCWE’s ability to break down the chemical structures of cellulose and hemicellulose in the wood matrices of A. malaccensis. Although the changes in FTIR of the sample from SCWE in this work is not apparent, previous studies have demonstrated the effective influence of the SCWE condition on the hydrolysis of the sample’s cellulose and hemicellulose to glucose [ 39, 53]. In short, the FTIR analysis showed some changes and partially supports other findings (yield and SEM) from this work.
